rows.label: tev022301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Liza about the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Liza if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Liza about her experience with
the xenoforms living in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Wow, newbie. You couldn't look more lost and
confused if you tried! Here, I'll talk you through it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0002
rows.name:
This district is where you'll find facilities like the
Outfitters test hangar, as well as the integrated
production plant that is so vital to life in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Other facilities include the waste-processing units,
which are run by my department.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Those are where we gather all of New LA's garbage
and roast the crap out of it. They're pretty much the
awesomest things in the entire district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0005
rows.name:
You should come take a look sometime.
As the manager, I can give you the VIP tour.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0008
rows.name:
The fundamental goal of humanity is finding the
Lifehold, wouldn't you say? I mean, that's the reason
we're all here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0009
rows.name:
So when I complain that my waste-processing units are
understaffed, do you think they send me any additional
people? Nope! Not a single one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Look, I know that we're in a state of emergency.
And I know that we all have to work hard and do
our part and blah blah blah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0011
rows.name: But I haven't had a day off in over a month![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0012
rows.name:
One of these days, I'm gonna work myself to death
and it'll be ME being incinerated![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I will accept help from literally ANYONE at this point.
Somebody, anybody, save me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0014
rows.name:
It's great how lively the city's become thanks to all our
new xenoform friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0015
rows.name:
But with the Ma-non inventing one incredible thing after
another, they're producing a ton of garbage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0016
rows.name:
And when the Nopon gather all of their goods from
their network of caravans throughout the planet,
you better believe it produces a lot of trash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0017
rows.name:
I already have the waste processors running night and
day, but we're still overflowing with garbage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0018
rows.name:
We gotta get that engineer guy Dazbeno to upgrade
the processors and increase their capacity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0019
rows.name:
If not, something bad's gonna happen, and then people
are gonna yell at me. And I don't like it when people
yell at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Liza about the Ganglion threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Liza about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Liza what she intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Yeah, I heard all about 'em from Dazbeno.
These "Ganglion" or whatever are real evil dudes, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0021
rows.name:
He said they've attacked and destroyed a whole bunch
of other planets besides Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0022
rows.name:
And then they apparently enslave the survivors and
turn them into lackeys or servants or whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0023
rows.name:
But we're not gonna tolerate that sort of thing.
Now go turn 'em to scrap with your BLADE power![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0024
rows.name:
...Oh, and then me and my waste processors will take
responsibility for recycling the remains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Now that we have the Zaruboggan, my waste-
management division is unstoppable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0029
rows.name:
You say you got garbage? I say bring it on and keep
it coming! I'll take whatever you throw at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0030
rows.name:
Man, the Zaruboggan really are great.
Thanks for telling me about them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0031
rows.name:
They really don't seem to come down from the Ma-non
ship too often, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0032
rows.name:
So if you hadn't told me about them, I doubt we'd
have become such good friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0040
rows.name:
The provisional government hasn't had the capacity
to oversee everything, so they've been ignoring the
undeveloped construction sites for, like, forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0041
rows.name:
But now that we've found the Lifehold Core, it sounds
like they're finally gonna get serious about building the
rest of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0042
rows.name:
And that means they're gonna generate a ton of
garbage. Our war begins right here and now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0043
rows.name:
But now I have other brave soldiers watching my back!
Like Dazbeno. And Nauzo Snagi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0044
rows.name:
Oh, and Arsenican and Trachlo Lythren, too.
I know they won't let me down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0045
rows.name:
We have absolutely nothing to fear.
There is no garbage we cannot handle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Liza about the Ganglion threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Liza about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0046
rows.name:
You know, it really seems like these people have
some sort of garbage-related secret power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0047
rows.name:
I think they could be the saviors of the waste-
management division. Just you wait until I've
scouted out a few![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Liza about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0048
rows.name: Did you hear that Arsenican had a baby?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0049
rows.name:
He said it was due to all the waste he's purified
here at the processing units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0050
rows.name:
Something about...uh...devoltan-izing? And how doing
that stores up energy used for birthing babies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0051
rows.name:
I guess the more they clean, the more they reproduce.
What a handy bunch to have around![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022301_MSG0052
rows.name:
If we'd had them back on Earth, they could have
cleared away toxic spills like they were nothing.
Preeeetty sweet.[ST:wait ]
